name: ToggleButton
description: ToggleButton component for selectable buttons. Used in groups for exclusive or multi-select options. Extends MUI ToggleButton with custom styling.

props.name: selected
props.description: If true, the button is selected

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the button is disabled

props.name: fullWidth
props.description: If true, the button takes full width

props.name: value
props.description: The value to associate with the button when selected

examples.title: View Toggle
Text Formatting
examples.code:
import { ToggleButton, ToggleButtonGroup } from '@/components';

<ToggleButtonGroup value={formats}>
  <ToggleButton value="bold">Bold</ToggleButton>
  <ToggleButton value="italic">Italic</ToggleButton>
</ToggleButtonGroup>

migrationExamples.description: Replace MUI ToggleButton with design system ToggleButton

bestPractices: Use within ToggleButtonGroup for exclusive selection
